revised_title: Royal Society Council Members and Committees in 1960
tldr: This article lists the members of the Royal Society Council in 1960, along with the committees they were part of, such as the Tercentenary Celebrations Committee, Finance Sub-Committee, Publications Committee, Ladies Sub-Committee, and more. The Royal Society is celebrating its tercentenary, marking 300 years since its founding in Gresham College.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
